name: Forgejo Git Mirror
title: Forgejo Git Mirror
description: Self-hosted Forgejo instance with automatic GitHub repository mirroring. Backs up your GitHub repos (including private) to a local Forgejo server.

env.label: Forgejo API Token
env.name: FORGEJO_TOKEN
env.description: Forgejo API token for the mirror bot (create after first login)

env.label: GitHub PAT (Personal)
env.name: GITHUB_PAT_PERSONAL
env.description: GitHub PAT for your personal account with repo read access

env.label: GitHub PAT (Org)
env.name: GITHUB_PAT_ORG
env.description: GitHub PAT with org repo read access for mirroring organization repositories

note: Deploy first, create an admin account on Forgejo, generate an API token, then update the stack with the token. The mirror bot syncs all your GitHub repos every 24h.
